page.title: 12LICHFIELD LIGHT INDUSTRY
page.content: Lichfield incoporates several industrial sites.The newest of these is "Enterprise Industrial Park" on the Boley Park Estate.This is a purpose- built site and has units which accommodate over forty businesses. Another similar estate has smaller units accommodating twenty-six small businesses.Along with these are several well established companies which have been in Lichfield for many years. Some of the factories deal in light engineering.There are also factories belonging to nationwide firms such as 'Pirelli' and 'Arthur Price of England' the Silversmith. A wide range of industries are represented including timber firms, electronics companies and office companies.
